dcterms:creator: Mike Zheng Shou
Stan Weixian Lei
Weiyao Wang
Deepti Ghadiyaram
Matt Feiszli
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for locating the boundaries of generic events in videos, consisting of 54,691 videos of 10 seconds each that span a broad spectrum of video domains in the wild and is open-vocabulary, taxonomy-free.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-GEBD

dcterms:creator: Dian Shao
Yue Zhao
Bo Dai
Dahua Lin
dcterms:description: A dataset containing Olympics sports videos with 21 actions, where the authors manually defined how to break each action into sub-actions during annotation. It is repurposed for the GEBD task by performing boundaries localization between sub-actions in each action instance.
dcterms:title: TAPOS
